column4: guys this cdrom thing is irking me to no end, im fooled with fstab ive even tried good ole' sudo mount /dev/cdrom /mnt/cdrom but it still says no meduim found
is there documentation _specifically_ for ubuntu edgy disc drives?
have you tried another CD ?? perhaps that particular CD is a bit iffy
it's a WoW cd, official not burned
i put in an audio cd and that autoplayed O_O
so you see  -- some CDs are iffy :)
ok but i _have_ to have these wow cds work, it's the only reason i own a computer :(
you mentioned CDs as in plural -- try another wow CD
this is not good, i need cd1 :( :(
errm .. are you sure that CD works well elsewhere? on another computer?
yes perfectly, and theres not a single nick or scratch this is only the second time ive ever taken it from its case
